comments.body: Looks like you'll always call this line if there is an exception rather than line 187, even though line 187 looks like it would match the old behavior more closely.  Maybe this is the source of the error.

I do not believe so, but let me login to my work machine and test out this theory.

IIRC, there was no message in e.. but I could be very wrong (or I had a bad rebase)
